candidates.why: Exact command oracle for session listing structure, metadata fields, progress counts, and output format.
Same session family; enumerates .workflow/active sessions and reads workflow-session.json for metadata.
Contains a discovery phase that lists sessions with metadata and handles 'no/single/multiple sessions' cases.
Reads session metadata and counts artifacts; useful for defining progress/statistics conventions.
Operates over workflow sessions and their artifacts; useful for shared session path conventions.

selected.why: Best-fit reference and required oracle for CMD-050.
